Prerequisites: MINIMUM GRADE OF C IN MAC 1105 OR APA 1111C
Course Description: ACCOUNTING CONCEPTS, PRINCIPLES, PROCEDURES AND UNDERLYING THEORIES APPLICABLE TO THE NATURE OF ACCOUNTING. ACCOUNTING FOR CORPORATIONS INCLUDING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, ACCOUNTING CYCLE, CURRENT ASSETS, PLANT AND EQUIPMENT, OTHER LONG-TERM ASSETS, CURRENT LIABILITIES, LONG-TERM DEBT, AND STOCKHOLDERS' EQUITY.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
